modName: Additional Child Beds For Major Hold Vanilla Homes
descriptionHtml:
WARNING: If you have anything stored in the Alchemy/Enchanting rooms in any of these houses, you will need to move them out first!

This file is in development so it won\'t work exceptionally well-I\'m getting help from others it will gut all of the 5 vanilla houses in the major holds and allow for 6 children to live in each of them in conjunction with the multiple adoption mod.

Honeyside redo is now complete, I will be working on Proudspire Manor next. Usual rules of moving family and reloading multiple times applies.

Proudspire Manor redo is now complete I will be working on Hjerm next. Usual rules of moving family and reloading multiple times applies. 

Hjerm redo is now complete I will be working on Breezehome next. Usual rules of moving family and reloading multiple times applies. 

Breezehome redo is now complete I will be working on Vlindrel Hall next. Usual rules of moving family and reloading multiple times applies. 

Vlindrel Hall redo is now complete I will be working on improvements next. Usual rules of moving family and reloading multiple times applies. 

I am aware that the pathing is not efficient and the sixth child sometimes just stands next to a bed. Also, in the future I will make updates so that as few items as possible are moved/deleted to make room for the beds.
author: Fusiontron
